name: Santacoin
description: SantaCoin ($SANTA) is a festive, community-driven memecoin built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) that captures the joy, generosity, and fun of the holiday season.Launched on fourmeme, with liquidity burnt forever and ownership renounced, SantaCoin embodies the true spirit of Christmas through memes, rewards, and giving.With a limited supply of 1BILLION tokens, no presale, and 100% fair community distribution, $SANTA delivers transparency, scarcity, and pure meme-powered holiday energy.SantaCoin rewards holders through automatic reflections, seasonal giveaways, NFT collectibles, and charitable initiatives that spread real-world cheer. Join the movement to “Ho-Ho-HODL” and make this Christmas legendary, both in spirit and on the blockchain.
